title: Thailand Cultural Journey

itinerary.title: Bangkok Arrival
itinerary.description: Arrive in Bangkok, visit Grand Palace and Wat Pho. Evening at Chatuchak Market.

itinerary.title: Ayutthaya Day Trip
itinerary.description: Explore ancient ruins of Ayutthaya, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

itinerary.title: Chiang Mai
itinerary.description: Flight to Chiang Mai. Visit Doi Suthep Temple and explore the old city.

itinerary.title: Elephant Sanctuary
itinerary.description: Ethical elephant interaction and traditional Thai cooking class.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Final shopping and transfer to airport.

description: Immerse yourself in Thailand's rich culture, ancient temples, and warm hospitality.
